post.desc:
~~Ma'am, you definitely ain't eighty pou-~~

How tall do you think Yukari really is?

For one, that [really ](https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/ZUN/ZUN%27s_E-mails) old height chart ZUN imagined put her as one of the taller characters along with Sakuya and Meiling. Since it's so old and it's just his guess at the time of writing the email, this doesn't really say anything. Still, though, I like to think that she's one of the tallest characters in the series.

On a side note, looking at her sprite in *Perfect Cherry Blossom* [alone](https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/File:Th07Yukari.png), I probably wouldn't have surmised that Yukari is even tall – that is to say, that looks more like a [**Yukari ojō-sama**](https://mangadex.org/title/cd7f99a1-ed50-4a6a-9f7c-19006ba4ce5d/touhou-touhou-kisougeki).
